review: This product has one important limitation--it does not work if it is more than 15 feet from the wireless router. What was especially annoying and frustrating for me is that this limitation is not mentioned upfront when purchasing the device online (which is how i purchased it). My house has several TVs and only one wireless router. I had planned to move the firestick around so I could watch it on any of my TVs, but only one set is close enough for it to work. Effectively you can only use the firestick if your wireless router is in the same room or the room next door.This distance limitation should have been disclosed upfront, but was not, Moreover, it is not mentioned anywhere I could find including the online tutorial, the instructions that come with the unit, and the troubleshooting section of the Amazon website. As a result I spent over two hours trying to set the firestick up on several TVs and combing through the online help area of the Amazon website. Note the problem was not obvious because the firestick immediately found my home wi-fi network during the setup operation, but it apparently requires a very strong signal to connect and had to be closer to the router. I only fiqured out the issue after finally getting a customer service person on the phone, which itself required me to navigate through multiple levels of dropdowns.So far the product works fine on my TV close to my wireless router.
